gallery.description: On my free time I have made some digital drawing projects, I made the logo and pet for @covita_bazar, this is a second hand e-bazar in Morelia. Also, I have made some graphic design projects. I consider digital drawing as one of my favourite hobbies since many years ago, next you can see some of the work I have made.

hobbies.description: Besides my studies, programming and engineering; I have another hobbies that have helped to my personal growth in terms of skill and creativity, some of them are:

interests.subtitle: I'm an Open Source Community enthusiast!
interests.description: Within the scope of informatics, I have afinity on the Open Source Community and its ethical values; I'm a GNU/LInux and AOSP enthusiast. Also, I have interest for the next topics:
